SENT.plain: A 19-year-old male received kicks to his head in the course of a fight with other young people
On admission to hospital he became drowsy and developed a hemiparesis and a facial paralysis on the right
After 3-4 days of continuous improvement the patient suddenly fell unconscious again and died on the seventh day after the trauma due to an increase of the intracranial pressure
Neuropathologic examination revealed an extensive dissection of the wall of the left anterior and middle cerebral artery
The age of the recurring infarction in the dependent areas of blood supply corresponded to the biphasic clinical course
